Package sources.client

Class MovieDataConsoleReader

java.lang.Object
sources.client.MovieDataConsoleReader
public class MovieDataConsoleReader extends Object
The MovieDataConsoleReader class provides static methods for reading movie data from console input. The class provides methods for reading movie name, coordinates, oscars count, genre, MPAA rating, and director name from console input.

  • Method Details

    • readMovieName

      public static String readMovieName(BasicReader basicReader, boolean inScriptMode) throws InvalidScriptException
      Reads the movie name from console input using a BasicReader instance.
      Parameters:
      basicReader - The BasicReader instance used for reading input from the console.
      inScriptMode - Boolean flag indicating whether the method is running in script mode.
      Returns:
      The movie name entered by the user.
      Throws:
      InvalidScriptException - If the method is running in script mode and the input is invalid.
